thread.section_title: Optimalprint Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Optimalprint | optimalprint.ca
thread.title: Krista Klippert

author: Krista Klippert
title: Krista Klippert
text: what a great experience, the website was super user friendly, great variety and had exactly what i was looking for. It took me 5 minutes to create my wedding invitations and 2 minutes to check out using Pay Pal which is great and I had my invitations in 2 days at my door. Even the prices were great!! good job optimal print, I will recommend you to everyone!
